data.actual_result: 2 of them will be stuck on loading until next restart as can be seen in the attachment.
data.expected_result: All of the pictures should be sent.
data.short_description: When you upload too many images to someone's DM's the last 2 get stuck permanently and are never really uploaded.
data.steps_to_repro: - Download the desktop version of Discord - Go to someone's DM's - Click the upload button on the left side of the chat box - Browse a folder and select some images (I selected 15) - Spam the button send button/enter key on your keyboard until all of the pictures are "sent"
